term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - fronting in chromatography
term.title: fronting

item.text: Asymmetry of a peak such that, relative to the baseline, the front is less steep than the rear. In paper chromatography and thin-layer chromatography, it refers to the distortion of a spot showing a diffuse region in front of the spot in the direction of flow.

sources.item: PAC, 1993, 65, 819. 'Nomenclature for chromatography (IUPAC Recommendations 1993)' on page 837 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199365040819)
